name: Tap Tap Arrow - TTA
description:
The aim is to dodge arrows, that come at you from both sides, by "dashing" through the arrow to get passed, see how many you can dodge!

Still in production, but here's what I've got so far. Hope you enjoy!

Things to be added:

- SFX (Dashes, Arrows and Buttons)

- Animated Arrow

- Menu System (Including 2 more game modes, and "shop")

- Highscore System

- Mobile support

PS: My highest score was 93, good luck :)
